subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cesc Fabregas scored twice before leaving with a recurring hamstring injury in Arsenal’s 3-0 victory over Aston Villa in the Premier League in London, and Manchester United kept pace with a 3-1 win at Hull. Wayne Rooney put United ahead, but Craig Fagan tied it from the penalty spot, and it took Andy Dawson’s own goal to put United back in control. Chelsea is 2 points ahead of United, and Arsenal is 2 points further behind.
